0.text: Innate: Urgot's six legs each conceal a shotgun that covers an arc, together forming a full circle of cover around him. Each shotgun can fire once before incurring a unique  cooldown.
0.html: Innate: Urgot's six legs each conceal a shotgun that covers an arc, together forming a full circle of cover around him. Each shotgun can fire once before incurring a unique  cooldown.
markedPassages: cooldown

1.text: Urgot's next basic attack  on-hit within the arc of a shotgun will cause it to fire in a cone, dealing 40% − 100% (based on level) AD (+ 2% − 6% (based on level) of target's maximum health) physical damage to enemies hit, capped at 100 − 360 (based on level) against  monsters.
1.html: Urgot's next basic attack on-hit within the arc of a shotgun will cause it to fire in a cone, dealing 40% − 100% (based on level) AD (+ 2% − 6% (based on level) of target's maximum health) physical damage to enemies hit, capped at 100 − 360 (based on level) against monsters.
markedPassages: on-hit
40% − 100% (based on level) AD
(+ 2% − 6% (based on level) of target's maximum health)
(+ 2% − 6% (based on level) of target's maximum health)
monsters

0.text: Active: Urgot launches a canister at the target location that explodes 0.3 seconds after it lands, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them for 1.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Urgot launches a canister at the target location that explodes 0.3 seconds after it lands, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and slowing them for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

0.text: Passive: Urgot's other abilities mark enemy champions for 5 seconds, only one enemy can be marked at a time. At maximum rank, Purge lasts indefinitely and becomes a toggled ability.
0.html: Passive: Urgot's other abilities mark enemy champions for 5 seconds, only one enemy can be marked at a time. At maximum rank, Purge lasts indefinitely and becomes a toggled ability.

1.text: Active: For 4 seconds, Urgot grants  ghosting to non-champions and non-epic monsters around him and autonomously attacks the nearest enemy at a fixed  3.0 attack speed, prioritizing marked enemy  champions, refreshing the mark with every attack. While firing, Urgot is able to move and gains 40%  slow resist, but his base movement speed is reduced by 125.
1.html: Active: For 4 seconds, Urgot grants ghosting to non-champions and non-epic monsters around him and autonomously attacks the nearest enemy at a fixed  3.0 attack speed, prioritizing marked enemy champions, refreshing the mark with every attack. While firing, Urgot is able to move and gains 40% slow resist, but his base movement speed is reduced by 125.
markedPassages: ghosting
3.0 attack speed
champions
slow resist

2.text: Attacks with Purge deal modified physical damage, with a minimum threshold of 50 against  monsters and  minions, and apply  on-hit and on-attack damage at 50% effectiveness, but cannot  critically strike. Urgot cannot perform attacks while unable to declare basic attacks.
2.html: Attacks with Purge deal modified physical damage, with a minimum threshold of 50 against monsters and minions, and apply on-hit and on-attack damage at 50% effectiveness, but cannot critically strike. Urgot cannot perform attacks while unable to declare basic attacks.
markedPassages: monsters
minions
on-hit
critically strike

3.text: Purge can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards.
3.html: Purge can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards.

0.text: Active: Urgot  shields himself for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Urgot shields himself for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: shields

1.text: After the cast time, Urgot  dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through,  knocking them aside and  stunning them for 1 second.
1.html: After the cast time, Urgot dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, knocking them aside and stunning them for 1 second.
markedPassages: dashes
knocking them aside
stunning

2.text: Urgot will stop upon hitting an enemy  champion,  stunning them for 1.5 seconds and, after 0.25 seconds, also  flinging them to the location 100 units behind him, though not through terrain.
2.html: Urgot will stop upon hitting an enemy champion, stunning them for 1.5 seconds and, after 0.25 seconds, also flinging them to the location 100 units behind him, though not through terrain.
markedPassages: champion
stunning
flinging

3.text: Purge can be cast during the dash.
3.html: Purge can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: Purge
possibleConcerningAbilities: Purge can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Urgot fires a chem-drill in the target direction that impales the first enemy champion hit, dealing physical damage and leashing them for 4 seconds, during which they're  revealed and  slowed by 0% − 75% (based on target's missing health).
0.html: Active: Urgot fires a chem-drill in the target direction that impales the first enemy champion hit, dealing physical damage and leashing them for 4 seconds, during which they're revealed and slowed by 0% − 75% (based on target's missing health).
markedPassages: revealed
slowed
0% − 75% (based on target's missing health)

1.text: Fear Beyond Death can be recast if the leashed target is below  25% of their maximum health, and does so automatically if the chem-drill would kill the target, the ability is cast again while the target was above the threshold and is then brought within it, or the target is within the threshold at the end of the duration.
1.html: Fear Beyond Death can be recast if the leashed target is below  25% of their maximum health, and does so automatically if the chem-drill would kill the target, the ability is cast again while the target was above the threshold and is then brought within it, or the target is within the threshold at the end of the duration.
markedPassages: 25% of their maximum health
25% of their maximum health

2.text: Recast - Mercy: Urgot launches chains at the leashed target, then  channels for 1.5 seconds once they latch on. During this time, he reels them toward him,  suppressing them,  revealing them, rendering them  untargetable, and preventing them from taking damage from other sources. If the target is near Urgot when the chains connect, they are pushed up to 1000 units away based on their proximity to him. This channel cannot be  interrupted by  crowd control.
2.html: Recast - Mercy: Urgot launches chains at the leashed target, then channels for 1.5 seconds once they latch on. During this time, he reels them toward him, suppressing them, revealing them, rendering them untargetable, and preventing them from taking damage from other sources. If the target is near Urgot when the chains connect, they are pushed up to 1000 units away based on their proximity to him. This channel cannot be interrupted by crowd control.
markedPassages: channels
suppressing
revealing
untargetable
interrupted
crowd control

3.text: Upon completing the channel, the target is   executed. If the execution is successful, he  fears nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds,  slowing them by 75%.
3.html: Upon completing the channel, the target is executed. If the execution is successful, he fears nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds, slowing them by 75%.
markedPassages: executed
executed
fears
slowing

4.text: Fear Beyond Death's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
4.html: Fear Beyond Death's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control
possibleConcerningAbilities: Fear Beyond Death's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

textContent.text: Passive: Urgot's other abilities mark enemy champions for 5 seconds, only one enemy can be marked at a time. At maximum rank, Purge lasts indefinitely and becomes a toggled ability.

textContent.text: Active: For 4 seconds, Urgot grants  ghosting to non-champions and non-epic monsters around him and autonomously attacks the nearest enemy at a fixed  3.0 attack speed, prioritizing marked enemy  champions, refreshing the mark with every attack. While firing, Urgot is able to move and gains 40%  slow resist, but his base movement speed is reduced by 125.

textContent.text: Fear Beyond Death can be recast if the leashed target is below  25% of their maximum health, and does so automatically if the chem-drill would kill the target, the ability is cast again while the target was above the threshold and is then brought within it, or the target is within the threshold at the end of the duration.

textContent.text: Recast - Mercy: Urgot launches chains at the leashed target, then  channels for 1.5 seconds once they latch on. During this time, he reels them toward him,  suppressing them,  revealing them, rendering them  untargetable, and preventing them from taking damage from other sources. If the target is near Urgot when the chains connect, they are pushed up to 1000 units away based on their proximity to him. This channel cannot be  interrupted by  crowd control.

3.html: Upon completing the channel, the target is executed. If the execution is successful, he fears nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds, slowing them by 75%.

4.text: Fear Beyond Death's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
4.html: Fear Beyond Death's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
